name: Elara
description: AI Assistant: Enhance your coding experience with the power of AI! This Visual Studio Code extension integrates OpenAI's advanced language model directly into your IDE, providing real-time code suggestions, documentation lookup, and intelligent code completion. Whether you're writing scripts, debugging, or documenting your code, AI Assistant brings you insightful AI-powered recommendations right where you need them. Perfect for developers looking to streamline their workflow and improve productivity, this tool taps into the capabilities of GPT models to offer not only coding assistance but also explanations and coding best practices. Get ready to code smarter, not harder, with AI Assistant at your side!

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
